long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A simple Chrome Extension that opens homebridge-config-u-x web UI.

You can use this chrome extension to control your home through a popup window.

All HomeBridge devices are compatible.

The plugin homebridge-config-u-x is required, and can be found at:
https://github.com/oznu/homebridge-config-ui-x
